message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $130?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $125. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for it. Would you be willing to go up to $135?
I understand your concerns about getting a fair price, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $135. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to consider your offer, but I still think I can get a better price for it. I'm thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm not sure I'm willing to go all the way up to $140. I was thinking more along the lines of $132. Would you be willing to meet me there?
